data.message: Thats a blessing. When i lost my job i became homeless no one knew i keep it to my self my kids gave me a place to stay but i have always been independent. And i felt so hurt n my son Edward. N daughter inlaw rented me a place to stay thank god for his blessings n thanks. To him i felt better there is no place like your. Own home glory to my god for all his blessings i feel for all the homeless people. Lord watch over them.

replies.message: Thank you for sharing a bit of your story Rosalinda
